div.p: AS SOON AS WE GET THEM
ABOARD, WE'LL BE ABLE TO RELAX.
WOULD YOU CARE TO BEAM DOWN

p.span: TO BOLDLY GO WHERE NO MAN
SINCE IT IS IN OUR SECTOR,

div.p: BUT IT WAS A STRONG SIGNAL,
AS THOUGH IT WAS VERY CLOSE.
THE SIZE OF A SCOUT SHIP,
WHAT SHE LOOKS LIKE CLOSE UP.
AND AS LONG AS I COMMAND,
I'VE PICKED UP THE LAST PART
IT IS IN NO KNOWN CODE.
WELL, AS FAR AS I CAN
SO IF I DON'T KILL HIM
WELL, IF THIS IS WHAT IT
MEANS, I DON'T WANT TO KNOW.
IF I WERE TO GIVE UP
HE HAD SOME SORT OF TRANSCEIVER.
IT WAS HIDDEN IN HIS ANTENNA.
NUMBER TWO SHIELD IS GONE, SIR.
